title: Skinny Cream Clinically Proven Cellulite Reduction, 6 Ounce
description: With its state of the art proprietary blend of potent ingredients, Skinny Cream gives you clinically proven results to reduce the appearance of cellulite, while making the body smoother and firmer. The skin will be smoother, firmer and healthier with more suppleness and elasticity...and a dramatic reduction in the appearance of cellulite.
